faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and methodology

projects.question: What types of projects do you specialize in?
projects.answer: We specialize in enterprise software development, including web applications, mobile apps, database infrastructure, and cloud solutions. Our team excels in Microsoft technologies, SQL Server, Azure, and VMware virtualization.

payment.question: How does your pay-per-delivery model work?
payment.answer: Our payment model is based on delivery waves, where we divide the project into functional modules. You only pay after each module is delivered and validated as 100% functional. This minimizes risk and ensures you receive value before making payments.

sourceCode.question: Do you provide source code for the projects?
sourceCode.answer: Yes, we offer flexible options. You can choose to receive the complete source code or just the final product, depending on your needs and preferences. All intellectual property rights are transferred according to our contract terms.

certifications.question: What certifications does your team hold?
certifications.answer: Our team holds various Microsoft certifications including MCT, MCSA, MCP, and MCTS, as well as VMware certifications like VSP and VTSP. These certifications validate our expertise in development, infrastructure, and cloud technologies.

security.question: How do you handle data security and compliance?
security.answer: We implement data masking, encryption, and follow best practices for ISO 27001/2, LGPD, and GDPR compliance. Our team creates detailed technical reports for regulatory approval and conducts security audits to ensure your data remains protected.

contact.title: Contact Us
